title: NirFit
description: This is a project built to learn modern technologies by creating a fitness tracker app. It helps users log exercises, calculate calories burned, and participate in fitness challenges to stay motivated.

title: Nirsic
description: This is a project created to learn new technologies and responsive by building a fun music quiz app. It allows users to test their knowledge of songs, artists, and music trivia through interactive quizzes and challenges.

title: Ar Project
description: This is a project developed to explore augmented reality by creating an interactive keyboard app. Users can play a virtual keyboard using AR, learning and experimenting with musical notes and melodies in a fun, immersive way.
